Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague : les notes des Blaugrana !




Apr√®s sa d√©faite face √† Levante (3-1), le FC Barcelone avait √† c≈ìur de r√©agir face au Slavia Prague, lors de la 4e journ√©e de Ligue de champions. Malgr√© la barre de Lionel Messi (35e), les Catalans ne trouvaient pas la solution en premi√®re mi-temps et ont m√™me vu Jordi Alba sortir √† la pause. Ce dernier a ressenti des douleurs √† la cuisse gauche. Le club a annonc√© que des examens auront lieu pour d√©terminer la gravit√© de sa blessure.



¬†




Kolar Ondrej, imp√©rial




Ondrej Kolar+11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Auteur de 6 parades dans cette rencontre, le portier du Slavia Prague Kolar Ondrej a permis √† son √©quipe de tenir se r√©sultat¬† (11e, 43e, 55e, 77e) et ainsi de comptabiliser 2 points dans ce groupe F, en attendant la rencontre entre le Borussia Dortmund et l'Inter Milan. De son c√¥t√©, le Bar√ßa reste leader avec 8 points malgr√© ce score nul et vierge (0-0)

text:
Champions League
Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague: The Blaugrana call home!
Faced with a huge Ondrej Kolar, FC Barcelona did not find the solution to win at home in the Champions League against Slavia Prague (0-0).
05 Nov 2019, 19:50 by Charlie Creteur



Marc Andr√© Ter Stegen: 6.5 / 10The matches go on and ter Stegen continues to be ultra regular. The few times he was worried, he was decisive in saving his team. Another perfect copy for the Barcelona goalie.Icon Sport



Jordi Alba: 4 / 10Very little visible in the first half, he will have proved dangerous only once in a nice move with Antoine Griezmann. Visibly touched, he left his place on the field to Sergi Roberto after the locker room.Icon Sport



Cl√©ment Lenglet: 6 / 10Little worried during most of the meeting, he is now the boss of the Barcelona defense, the fault in particular a dive increasingly difficult. A solid match from the French defender.Icon Sport



G√©rard Piqu√©: 5 / 10In difficulty against the Czechs, Gerard Piqu√© no longer has the level of yesteryear. During the match, he did not hesitate to go out very high to annoy the attacking opponents, leaving many spaces in his back that the Slavia players have, fortunately for him, not able to exploit.



Nelson Semedo: 6 / 10Very active in the first period, he was very complicit with Ousmane Demb√©l√©, despite blatant inaccuracies when delivering the last pass or even in the last move. He was then less comfortable with his replacement on the left side. Defensively, Olayinka has asked a lot of worries.



Sergio Busquets: 4 / 10The best hours of Sergio Busquets are now behind him. Very little present in the inter-game, it is now lacking cutting edge to help his team, even if the finesse of his touch of ball remains a treat. However, this could be limited for the rest of the season. Replaced by Rakitic at 68.Icon Sport



Arturo Vidal: 6 / 10With all the grinta we know him, Vidal tried to make his law midfield against the surly Czech. He was surely the most prominent man in the blaugrana interview. He could even have brought the goal of victory if Messi had not been offside before serving.Icon Sport



Frenkie De Jong: 5.5 / 10In a runner position that he does not appreciate necessarily, the former Ajax did not shine tonight. Discreet offensively, he helped against the defensive tasks, and was then more comfortable during the exit of Busquets and his replacement in front of the defense.



Ousmane Demb√©l√©: 4 / 10If he was very complicit with Nelson Semedo during the first period, Ousmane Demb√©l√© failed to erase the flaws that still stick to his skin. Very agitated, he sinned for lack of precision in his transmissions or in his last gesture. A benefit to review, even if the desire was there. Replaced by Ansu Fati at 64th.Icon Sport



Lionel Messi: 6 / 10It had been a long time since a goalkeeper had not bothered Lionel Messi so much. The Argentinian has tried his luck a great deal (20th, 34th, 42nd, 49th, 58th), beating each time on the Czech goalkeeper. Even when he finds Vidal pushing the ball into the empty net, he is finally reported offside. The "Pulga" did not turn into a hero tonight, in charge of revenge.



Antoine Griezmann: 5 / 10Always available, Griezmann is still struggling to be decisive. His agreement with his teammates is still to perfect, especially with Messi who has forgotten at least once (34th). However, he showed a good relationship with Alba in the first half.Icon Sport

Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague: the notes of Blaugrana!




After losing to Levante (3-1), FC Barcelona were eager to react to Slavia Prague on Matchday 4 of the Champions League. Unlike the previous day (1-2 win), the Blaugrana were uninspired tonight. Despite the bar Lionel Messi (35), the Catalans did not find the solution in the first half and even saw Jordi Alba out at the break. The latter felt pain in his left thigh. The club has announced that exams will be held to determine the severity of his injury.








Kolar Ondrej, imperial




Ondrej Kolar + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Author of 6 parades in this meeting, the goalkeeper of Slavia Prague Kolar Ondrej allowed his team to hold his result (11th, 43rd, 55th, 77th) and thus to score 2 points in this group F, pending the meeting between the Borussia Dortmund and Inter Milan. For its part, Bar√ßa remains leader with 8 points despite this draw (0-0)
